scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "主应用,Vue子应用,React子应用" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --prefix "{name}" "npm run dev" "npm run dev:vue" "npm run dev:react"
scripts.preview:all: concurrently --names "主应用,Vue子应用,React子应用" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" --prefix "{name}" "npm run preview" "npm run preview:vue" "npm run preview:react"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd vue-sub-app && npm run build && cd ../react-sub-app && npm run build
scripts.build:preview: npm run build && cd vue-sub-app && npm run build:preview && cd ../react-sub-app && npm run build:preview
scripts.start:preview: npm run build:preview && npm run preview:all
